price: Dijeron [los otros hijos]: "¡Por Dios! Sigues en tu antiguo error".
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
